title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to composting and other organics
recycling facilities for municipal solid waste, source-separated organics
(SSO), biosolids, septage, yard trimmings or other organic waste. This Subpart
also applies to any combination of these activities or materials. The
requirements contained in Part 360 of this Title also apply to this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
